page.title: 17Our School:Park Brow Kirkby
page.content:
Our school is called Park Brow Juniors in Kirkby. Most of the time I like our school. Most days we do Maths and English work in the morning. Sometimes we watch television programmes and do some work about them. After having our dinner we might do some work on History and Geography or we might paint or go out for a game in P.E. I like school because we do different things all the time and although sometimes I get fed up with working, usually it's not too bad. Our school has a football team that plays after school. I would like to get into the team next year.
Richard McIlroy. Aged 10.
